overview:
Prior to joining Rho in 2008, Haider worked at McKinsey & Company where he focused on corporate strategy and business development efforts, as well as buyout transactions for private equity clients. Prior to joining McKinsey, Haider founded and led his own real estate investment firm.

Haider is a gastroenterologist/hepatologist and trained at Yale School of Medicine. He received his MD degree from UCLA. Haider was a University of California Presidentâ€™s Research Fellow and was inducted into the Yale Society of Distinguished Teachers.
